description: This source file defines the NoteDetailViewModel class, which manages the UI-related data for note details in an Android app. It interacts with the NoteRepository to fetch and delete notes asynchronously, leveraging Android architecture components such as LiveData and ViewModelScope.

classes.name: NoteDetailViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class that provides note details and delete functionality for UI components. It holds LiveData objects for note data and performs database operations within a coroutine scope.

methods.name: loadNote
methods.description: Loads a note from the repository by its ID and updates the LiveData.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a given note via the repository and executes a callback upon completion.
